Subject: Advanced Pattern Drafting: Make a Sloper Workshop
Description: Learn to make your own pattern base customized to your own specific measurements to use in making future patterns fit you perfectly! Subject: Advanced Special FX Makeup for Cosplay Workshop
Description: Learn and try various products and techniques in SFX makeup and face and body painting. We will be using foam, latex, and silicone appliances. We will learn and practice some of the more advanced SFX skills on ourselves and each other. Space is limited so please sign up in advance near Ops!  Speakers include:Jeannie Arquette - Track: Cosplay  - Duration: 2 hours
